Name: Little Island
About the game: Little Island offers you the experience of interacting with a variety of cute animals in VR space. Dive into a world full of nature and adorable animal children. You will be healed by interacting with the lively animals. Help them in their time of need, play with them, and love them. The world of Little Island You can meet the adorable animal children who are so realistic and want to hug them. Dogs and cats, penguins and seals, a total of 18 unique animal species await you. In addition to a variety of locations such as forest, grassland, ice field and abandoned place, there are also unique spots such as the fantastic Northern Lights and soothing bonfires. Communicating with Animals The animals you meet for the first time are looking for food, stuck in a tree, or in need of your help. Use items and your wits to help them out of their predicament. After rescuing the animals, gently pet, hug, play with them by throwing a ball, and get on with them. Other features In addition to interacting with animals, you can also enjoy fishing, planting seeds to grow flowers, and freely driving radio-controlled cars. You can display the fish you catch and the flowers you grow in an aquarium or vase, creating your own favorite space in your own room.
